refnamediv.refpurpose: Load weather stations locations into the WDB database. It is a part of the WDB system.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: stationLoad loads the location(s) of the weather station(s) into the wdb database. The database must be up and running for this program to work, unless one of the options --help or --list have been given on the command line.

The STINFOSYS (http://stinfosys) is considered as the authoritative source for weather stations at the met.no. STINFOSYS holds, among other things, information about stations position, their WMO number, internal ID, place name, validity dates and so on. Only internal ID is unique. Place names and WMO numbers are not. The internal ID as placename in WDB within default placenamspaceid. The WMO number is used as value for placename in WDB within 4356 placenamespaceid.

refsect1.title: Exit Status
refsect1.para: stationLoad returns 0 to the shell if it finished normally and 1 if a fatal error occured during loading (out of memory, files not found, database not found, etc.).
